title: Texas’ MASSIVE Pro-Life Victory | Guest: Rev. Johnnie Moore | 9/2/21
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss Texas’ new heartbeat abortion law. Glenn reads some angry tweets from people who hate Texas' new heartbeat abortion law. Author and pastor Johnnie Moore joins to share his efforts to save Christians from Afghanistan and how fast Afghanistan has crumbled under President Biden. Glenn shares more updates on the Afghanistan rescue missions and discusses a weird situation regarding Facebook. The CDC has released guidance on how to appropriately describe people with addictions, and Glenn and Stu discuss the absurdity. Glenn and Stu discuss how good a job the military did in Afghanistan despite being hindered by the Biden administration. Stu compares President Biden’s plummeting approval rating with former presidents.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
